Set up connection to random.cdisc.data

rcd_dataset.Rd

Set up connection to random.cdisc.data

rcd_dataset(dataname, fun, ...)

Arguments

dataname

name of dataset
fun

(function) connection function
...

additional arguments passed to fun

Value

(DatasetConnector) type of object

Examples

library(random.cdisc.data)
x <- rcd_dataset("ADSL", radsl, cached = TRUE)
x$get_call()
#> [1] "ADSL <- radsl(cached = TRUE)"
x$get_data()
#> # A tibble: 400 x 33
#>    STUDYID USUBJID SUBJID SITEID   AGE SEX   RACE  COUNTRY INVID INVNAM ARM

#>  1 AB12345 AB1234… id-128 CHN-3     32 M     ASIAN CHN     INV … Dr. C… A: D…

#>  3 AB12345 AB1234… id-378 RUS-3     30 F     ASIAN RUS     INV … Dr. R… C: C…
#>  4 AB12345 AB1234… id-220 CHN-11    26 F     ASIAN CHN     INV … Dr. C… B: P…
#>  5 AB12345 AB1234… id-267 CHN-7     40 M     ASIAN CHN     INV … Dr. C… B: P…
